quests.desc: Welcome to another exciting game of TextWorld! First, it would be good if you could try to go to the east. After that, head south. Once you finish that, attempt to venture south. Okay, and then, try to go to the west. After that, take a trip south. With that done, make an attempt to head south. After that, venture west. And then, recover the latchkey from the dresser. And then, unlock the box. And then, ensure that the box is open. And once you've done that, you win!

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in the place we're calling the restroom. You begin looking for stuff.

 You see a box. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The box is empty![end if] You make out a dresser. Huh, weird.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The dresser is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a shower. A standard one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the cubicle.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a washroom. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type F safe here.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The type F safe contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The type F safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a pantry. A normal kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've entered a cellar. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can make out a workbench. [if there is something on the s_0]On the workbench you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You are in a laundromat. An usual one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You are in a launderette. A typical kind of place.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a playroom. A normal one.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You are in a steam room. An usual kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's here.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just walked into a vault.

 You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_3]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty, what a horrible day![end if] As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a trunk.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The trunk is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've entered a bedchamber.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a shelf. The shelf is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_1] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_1]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You arrive in a garage. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 Oh, great. Here's a table. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You are in a sauna. An ordinary kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a type 5 locker. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The type 5 locker contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The type 5 locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a chest. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a kitchen.

 You can make out a fridge.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The fridge is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a laundry place.

 You can make out a type 7 safe.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The type 7 safe contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type 7 safe is empty![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
Ah, the canteen. This is some kind of canteen, really great normal vibes in this place, a wonderful normal atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it.

 You make out [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] case.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The case contains [a list of things in the c_9]. Is this it? Is this what you came to TextWorld to see? a case?[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The case is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see a rack. You shudder, but continue examining the rack. The rack is normal.[if there is something on the s_3] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You've seen better parlors, but at least this one seems pretty ordinary. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You can see a safe.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_10]. A safe... Is that really what you were looking for?[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a bed stand. The bed stand is typical.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bed stand you see [a list of things on the s_4]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bed stand.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You're now in a basement.

 You can make out a stand. Now why would someone leave that there? The stand is usual.[if there is something on the s_5] On the stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the stand.[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a counter. The counter is usual.[if there is something on the s_6] On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a bathroom.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: gateway
infos.desc: it's a well-built gateway [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: box
infos.desc: The box looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The dresser looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The fondue looks delectable.

infos.name: chocolate bar
infos.desc: that's a normal chocolate bar!

infos.name: legume
infos.desc: The legume looks tasty.

infos.name: loaf of bread
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.name: type F keycard
infos.desc: The type F keycard is cold to the touch

infos.desc: The type 5 key is cold to the touch

infos.desc: The metal of the type 7 key is brushed.

infos.name: paper towel
infos.desc: The paper towel would seem to be well matched to everything else here

infos.name: pair of headphones
infos.desc: The pair of headphones appears out of place here

infos.desc: The insect is modern.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is undependable.

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is an unstable piece of garbage.

infos.desc: The rack is stable.

infos.desc: The bed stand is shaky.

infos.desc: The stand is shaky.

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.desc: that's a normal potato!

infos.name: cashew
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that ordinary thing.

infos.name: latchkey
infos.desc: The metal of the latchkey is polished.

infos.name: keycard
infos.desc: The keycard is surprisingly heavy.

infos.name: passkey
infos.desc: The passkey looks useful

infos.desc: The glove is clean.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First stop, make an effort to head east. Then, venture south. And then, make an attempt to head south. Then, try to venture west. Then, go south. Then, go to the south. And then, head west. Okay, and then, recover the latchkey from the dresser. And then, make absolutely sure that the box is unlocked. Once you have unlocked the box, doublecheck that the box in the restroom is open. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
